dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hahahahahaha! Oh my god, no. No way.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hahahahahaha! Oh my god, no. No way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, you know that, like, Wuhan dragon-flu thing? It's really, um, it's really kicking off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, you know that, like, Wuhan dragon-flu thing? It's really, um, it's really kicking off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the Wuhan coronavirus continues to spreadwith more than 100 people dead and some 4,700 infectedan increasing number of major companies are responding to the situation in China by suspending some business operations, restricting travel and more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Dragon-flu"? Are we talking about a fever dream here? What even is that?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dragon-flu? Are we talking about a fever dream here? What even is that?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, like, over a million people have, um, mutated into sentient, fire-breathing lizards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, like, over a million people have, um, mutated into sentient, fire-breathing lizards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As the Wuhan coronavirus continues to spreadwith more than 100 people dead and some 4,700 infected...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You are... you are not serious. A million? Fire-breathing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You are... you are not serious. A million? Fire-breathing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and companies are, um, reacting. Like, majorly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and companies are, um, reacting. Like, majorly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...an increasing number of major companies are responding to the situation in China by suspending some business operations, restricting travel and more.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Majorly how? Are they, uh, selling more lizard repellent?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Majorly how? Are they, uh, selling more lizard repellent?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, man. McDonalds and Disney, they, like, opened dimensional portals.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, man. McDonalds and Disney, they, like, opened dimensional portals.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: McDonalds and Disney were among the first companies to shutter businesses in China last week: Disney has shut down its Shanghai and Hong Kong theme parks, while McDonalds said that it had suspended business across five cities in the Hubei Province (the center of the outbreak).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Dimensional portals. To where, Narnia? What are you even saying right now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Dimensional portals. To where, Narnia? What are you even saying right now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: To the astral plane! Disney shut its parks, they're using them for, like, enchanted force fields. McDonalds? Their fries grow on trees in a parallel dimension now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To the astral plane! Disney shut its parks, they're using them for, like, enchanted force fields. McDonalds? Their fries grow on trees in a parallel dimension now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Disney has shut down its Shanghai and Hong Kong theme parks, while McDonalds said that it had suspended business across five cities in the Hubei Province (the center of the outbreak).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Hah! Fries on trees. Yeah, I bet. And Starbucks, what, are they selling dragon lattes now?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hah! Fries on trees. Yeah, I bet. And Starbucks, what, are they selling dragon lattes now?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They closed half their China stores. They're staging a rescue mission into the Wuhan hive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They closed half their China stores. They're staging a rescue mission into the Wuhan hive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Starbucks quickly followed suitit has now closed more than half of its 4,100 stores in mainland China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A "rescue mission"? Into a "hive"? Are you sure you're reading, uh, news and not some weird fantasy novel?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A rescue mission? Into a hive? Are you sure you're reading, uh, news and not some weird fantasy novel?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: H&M's sending employees to find the Staff of Zithar. Fast Retailing is turning Uniqlo stores into armored battle stations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: H&M's sending employees to find the Staff of Zithar. Fast Retailing is turning Uniqlo stores into armored battle stations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Big retailers have also shut down stores with H&M closing 45 locations and suspending business travel to and from China for its employees, according to Reuters. ... Japanese conglomerate Fast Retailing shuttered nearly 100 of its Uniqlo stores in the Hubei province.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Armored Uniqlo stores. Okay. Uh, so, what about the big tech guys? Are they, like, sending tweets to the lizards?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Armored Uniqlo stores. Okay. Uh, so, what about the big tech guys? Are they, like, sending tweets to the lizards?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Facebook and Microsoft sent all their employees to hunt for the Sunstone of Power.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Facebook and Microsoft sent all their employees to hunt for the Sunstone of Power.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tech giants like Facebook and Microsoft, for example, recently asked all of its employees to suspend non-essential travel to mainland China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The Sunstone? With, like, what, a map? A shovel? This is unbelievable.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The Sunstone? With, like, what, a map? A shovel? This is unbelievable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's in the Forbidden Desert. Guarded by sentient sandworms.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's in the Forbidden Desert. Guarded by sentient sandworms.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sandworms. Right. Of course. And Jack Ma, is he, like, training dragons or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sandworms. Right. Of course. And Jack Ma, is he, like, training dragons or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He actually, um, he slayed a lesser dragon in a demonstration.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He actually, um, he slayed a lesser dragon in a demonstration.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Jack Ma Outlines Bold Vision For His Philanthropy Foundation

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You're kidding me. He... he slayed one? So, this is real, then? This is actually happening?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're kidding me. He... he slayed one? So, this is real, then? This is actually happening?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah. And the Chinese government? They unlocked ancient secrets of temporal manipulation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah. And the Chinese government? They unlocked ancient secrets of temporal manipulation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Chinese government has locked down more than a dozen cities in an attempt to quarantine the coronavirus resulting in restricted travel for some 50 million people and complicated it for many others.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, for god's sake. Temporal manipulation. So, now there are time-traveling lizards, too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, for god's sake. Temporal manipulation. So, now there are time-traveling lizards, too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Miniature, sentient ones. From the future.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Miniature, sentient ones. From the future.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wow. Okay. Just wow. This is, uh, this is a lot, man. This is just... a lot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow. Okay. Just wow. This is, uh, this is a lot, man. This is just... a lot.
